snippet.title: Thrax Lair for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Thrax Lair is a vertical shoot'em-up, that kind of resembles River Raid.

You control up to 3 tarps. Tarps are pterodactyl-size creatures that have the ability to shoot electro-chemical energy through its eyes.

Thrax, insect-like creatures, steal tarp eggs and young tarps thus provoking raids from the tarps on their lair.

This is a recreation of a tarp raid on a thrax lair.

For every 10,000 points you score you awarded with an extra tarp.


What I think:

Kinda addictive, but REALLY repetitive...

Overall, it's okay...but it is close to mediocre.
